PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for getting features from

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: grammarURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The path to the main file in the grammar.

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the grammar

PARAMETER.NAME: ontology
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The ontology to be used by this transducer
